page_content:
*AIS.PL Sp. z o.o.*.

The company, from among its employees, identifies supervisors or consultants for groups of students performing an IT project within the "Team Programming" course.

*Allegro Group*.

Allegro Group - "Partner of the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science at the Nicolaus Copernicus University in Toruń" - cooperates with the University in the field of student education by having its employees teach.

*AMG.net SA.

The company, from among its employees, selects supervisors or consultants for groups of students doing an IT project as part of the "Team Programming" course. It supervises groups of students in the field of business based on the knowledge used to conduct it.

*Atos*.

Advising and consulting on the development of study programs and professional practice programs, consulting on the program of postgraduate studies "IT in foreign languages", cooperating in their organization and strengthening the promotion of the studies, giving opinions on the programs of specialties at the Faculties (the entities competent to carry out the activities of the University under the agreement are the Faculty of Philology and the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science of the University of Krakow).

*Icotera*.

From among its employees, the Company will type tutors or consultants for groups of students performing an IT project within the 'Team Programming' course, and will cooperate with the Faculty in organizing student internships and placements in accordance with the study program and the Company's current capabilities and needs.

*NEUCA S.A.*.

Cooperation within the framework of the subject "Team Programming". Expected result: realization of the goals included in the development strategy of Nicolaus Copernicus University for 2011-2020.

*NOKIA*.

The company selects from among its employees tutors or consultants for groups of students performing an IT project within the subject "Team Programming". The Company cooperates with the Faculty in organizing student internships and placements in accordance with the study program and the Company's current capabilities and needs.

*Simplito Ltd.

The company has committed to teach the course "Practical aspects of entrepreneurship".

*TARR Innovation Center Sp. z o.o.*.

The Innovation Center has undertaken to conduct classes in the subject "Practical aspects of entrepreneurship".

*Telekomunikacja Polska Spółka Akcyjna*.

The signed cooperation agreement provides for cooperation in agreeing on topics for research papers, agreeing on topics for master's theses, and presenting and promoting each other's achievements.

*Statistical Office in Bydgoszcz*.

In addition to cooperation within the framework of the subject "Team Programming", the office offers student internships and accepts students of the Department for internships.

metadata.title: Partners with whom the Department has signed cooperation agreements
